name: One Night with The Monster
description:
You have been traped in a white room. Outside there is a monster roaming in the hallways. Can you survive this shit and prove yourself cooler then usual?

ONwTM is a game made my the not famous developer lipegrs, in order to satisfy his insatiable desire to make games and be popular.

Dive into this new adventure and beware! There is only 50% power...
